languages.text: "Хм. Тот ответ, который я ожидал. Я рассчитываю на то, что ждать встречи долго не придется — моя сестра, прознав о событиях на арене, подошлет убийц или же вознамерится... сама..."
"Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."
languages.original_text: "Хм. Тот ответ, который я ожидал. Я рассчитываю на то, что ждать встречи долго не придется — моя сестра, прознав о событиях на арене, подошлет убийц или же вознамерится... сама..."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嗯，正是我所期待的答案。恐怕过不了多久，我们就能见面了。等到我姐姐得知了竞技场上发生的事情之后，她一定会派来刺客，或是亲自动手……”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，正是我所期待的答案。恐怕过不了多久，我们就能见面了。等到我妹妹得知了竞技场上发生的事情之后，她一定会派来刺客，或是亲自动手……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ。期待通りの答えだ。対決まで長く待つことはないだろう…アリーナでの出来事を姉貴が知れば、アサシンを送り込むか、覚悟を決めて自らやって来るだろうさ…」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。期待通りの答えだ。対決まで長く待つことはないだろう…アリーナでの出来事を姉貴が知れば、アサシンを送り込むか、覚悟を決めて自らやって来るだろうさ…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Hum. La respuesta que estaba esperando. Espero que la confrontación no se demore en demasía; cuando mi hermana descubra lo que ha sucedido en la arena, mandará asesinos o decidirá presentarse ella misma...».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: «Hum. La respuesta que estaba esperando. Espero que la confrontación no se demore en demasía; cuando mi hermana descubra lo que ha sucedido en la arena, mandará asesinos o decidirá presentarse ella misma...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Bien... Ravi de vous l'entendre dire. La confrontation ne se fera pas attendre bien longtemps. Dès qu'elle apprendra ce qui s'est passé dans l'arène, ma sœur enverra des assassins, à moins qu'elle se décide à venir elle-même... »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: « Bien... Ravi de vous l'entendre dire. La confrontation ne se fera pas attendre bien longtemps. Dès qu'elle apprendra ce qui s'est passé dans l'arène, ma sœur enverra des assassins, à moins qu'elle se décide à venir elle-même... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm. Mit dieser Antwort habe ich gerechnet. Ich glaube nicht, dass wir lange auf diese Konfrontation warten müssen – wenn meine Schwester erfährt, was in der Arena geschehen ist, wird sie Assassinen entsenden oder sogar selbst erscheinen ..."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Mit dieser Reaktion habe ich gerechnet. Ich glaube nicht, dass wir lange auf diese Konfrontation warten müssen – wenn meine Schwester erfährt, was in der Arena geschehen ist, wird sie Assassinen entsenden oder sogar selbst erscheinen ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

languages.text: "Hımm... Umduğum cevap. Karşılaşma için çok fazla bekleyeceğimizi sanmıyorum. Kız kardeşim, arenada olan bitenden haberdar olduğu an ya suikastçılarını gönderir ya da kendi gelmeye karar verir..."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. The answer I was expecting. I do not expect to wait long for the confrontation — when my sister learns of what occurred in the arena, she will send assassins, or decide to come herself..."

traits.locale_text: "Hımm... Umduğum cevap. Karşılaşma için çok fazla bekleyeceğimizi sanmıyorum. Kız kardeşim, arenada olan bitenden haberdar olduğu an ya suikastçılarını gönderir ya da kendi gelmeye karar verir..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
